info.description: API Retrieve the list of exception Arrangement Activity details
info.title: Pending Arrangement Activities

get.summary: Retrieve the list of pending Arrangement Activity details

parameters.name: activity
parameters.description: Defines the activity to be processed against the Arrangement. The activity may be a user activity or a system generated activity.

parameters.name: recordStatus
parameters.description: General status of the record. Possible values: - null - authorised - IHLD - input, on hold - INAU - input, not authorised - INA2 - input, authorised, pending second authorisation - INAO - input, not authorised with blocking overrides - RNAU - reversed, not authorised - RNAO - reversed, not authorised with blocking overrides

aaArrangementActivity.description: Arrangement Activity application serves both as a mechanism to allow a user to initiate an Activity and as a record of each Activity that has been processed against the Arrangement.

arrangementId.description: The unique identifier of an arrangement contract.

masterArrangement.description: Indicate the Master arrangement activity which initiated the transaction

productId.description: Contains the unique identifier of the product, e.g. the product id of the arrangement account.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
